Detailed Description

Structure describing the data format used for stores to the FPA.

uint64_t cvmx_fpa3_iobdma_data_t::scraddr

the (64-bit word) location in scratchpad to write to (if len != 0)

the number of words in the response (0 => no response) the ID of the device on the non-coherent bus the address that will appear in the first tick on the NCB bus

length of return in workds, must be one. If the pool has no availale pts in the selected pool then the ptr returned for the IOBDMA operation are 0s, indicating that the pool does not have an adequate number of ptrs to satisfy the IOBDMA. the ID of the device on the non-coherent bus OCI node number Perform RED on allocation Reserved Aura number Reserved
